thread.title: Cecil Shorts ahead of schedule in recovery from dislocated left shoulder

title: Cecil Shorts ahead of schedule in recovery from dislocated left shoulder
text:
Published By: Houston Chronicle Sports - Today 
Texans starting wide receiver Cecil Shorts is regarded as ahead of schedule after dislocating his left shoulder on the final play of a loss ...
